attributes.action: Order a public inquiry into the Stoke-on-Trent mosque fiasco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why has Stoke-on-Trent council granted the muslim community a 2-acre piece of land for just £1 a year rent?  And why are they striking a deal to sell the land to the muslim community in 2011 for a price of just £72,000?  The land is estimated to be worth from £500k to £1m.  I'm all for building communities but this, at least financially, seems crazy.

This needs to be investigated and it is in the public interest to do so.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Order a public inquiry into the Stoke-on-Trent mosque fiasco."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19556


Prime Minister's Office
